entities.name: vi
entities.description: The pale witch who is indignantly denying something.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A person who is soothingly telling Vi that it's the password.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The person who has entered the common room and is being greeted by Gryffindor House.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: A member of Gryffindor House who is half annoyed and half impressed with Harry's actions.

entities.name: george
entities.description: A member of Gryffindor House who is deeply impressed with Harry's ability to enter the common room without getting a beard.

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: The group of people from Gryffindor House who are greeting Harry and reacting to his actions.

relationships.description: Vi is disagreeing with the Fat Lady about what the password is.
Harry is being greeted by Gryffindor House as he enters the common room.
Fred is reprimanding Harry for not telling them that he had entered the common room.
George is admiringly commenting on Harry's ability to enter the common room without getting a beard.
